headline: Equifax (EFX) Declares US$0.50 Dividend Despite Recent Market Dip
summary: Equifax (EFX) recently announced a quarterly dividend of $0.50 per share, set to be paid on September 15, 2025. This declaration comes amid a weekly share price decline of 1.95%, consistent with broader market trends where the S&P 500 also fell for five consecutive days. As investors anticipate Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's speech, market volatility has been prevalent. While the dividend announcement reflects stability in Equifax's commitment to shareholder returns, it aligns with...
